claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a table titled “Adults 18–49 Years of Age, Study 1” showing efficacy data for Flublok versus saline placebo in a clinical trial population aged 18–49. It reports case counts, percentages, vaccine efficacy and confidence intervals, but makes no mention of regulatory approval or an approved age indication. Therefore, while it shows that Flublok was studied in adults starting at age 18, it does not provide evidence that it is approved for adults 18 years and older.
